examples.text: Should've friendzoned this one in an amicable way so he'd
the skeleton friendzoned me and it broke my heart # sharkbottweet
lunch and a movie and I felt so friendzoned I bro-fisted him goodbye .
Just been friendzoned by a hooker , if you were wonderin
Holy shit I think I'm being friendzoned fuck my life
don't care if this sounds petty ; I've friendzoned most of the girls who friendzoned me back

relations.target: zone: an area or region distinguished from adjacent parts by a distinctive feature or characteristic <i81768>
friend: a person with whom you are acquainted; 'I have trouble remembering the names of all my acquaintances'; 'we are friends of the family' <i88061>
treat: interact in a certain way; 'Do right by her'; 'Treat him with caution, please'; 'Handle the press reporters gently' <i34283>

senses.definition: To treat as a friend although the other party has romantic feelings
